segments.text: I notice the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, which makes this even more absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but I’m not holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR
